Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
Summary: Saw early in morning again at night,then saw overhead brite flash overhead then traveled up and away
divs: Sighting DetailsWent out to feed horse saw what looked like a strobing orange and yellow ball in west sky hovering.Seemed to be bouncing around a bit.Called my wife to look at it and we got the camera to get a picture,took 4 but can,t tell a lot from them.Came back in to get my long range camera and when I came back ouy it was gone.That afternoon at about 9:15 it was back in same place we watched it hover for about 15 min. or so then another showed up a few miles fron it at same height.they moved off one to the north the other west.Watched for them for a while when I saw one of them straight overhead way up,there was a bright flash and it travled up and to the south and out of sight,I watched it go almost straight -up and away.This was something that I can,t make sense of shook me up a bit!
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Thomasville
